item.title: “Hello world!” in WordPress?
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: Welcome everyone! After getting over the pressure from other programmers of looking down on WordPress, I finally made the jump into it and to put the experience into simple words, the learning curve to WP is significantly less steep than that of JS libraries. As the oddball I am in the world of tech enthusiasts […]

item.title: Blockchain in a nutshell
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: I recently came to what I believe is the end (for now) of a project I’ve been working on for somewhere around 4-5 months. Spiro Buzharovski’s book “Introducing Blockchain with Java” caught my eye last summer at my local library, so I made sure to come back and snatch it. What followed was very little […]
